titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the discovery of sickle cell disease by Dr. James B. Herrick.
A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the discovery of sickle cell disease by Dr. James B. Herrick.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the discovery of sickle cell disease.
Recognizes the biomedical research community's contributions to improvement in its diagnosis and treatment.
